name: Zeitgeist Inc.
description:
Welcome to Zeitgeist Inc.!

This game is part of a research project aimed at conducting a psychological study in a way that is entertaining for participants. But don't worry, for you it will just be a normal game about hunting evil ghosts. I hope you enjoy it!

You will need a mouse for it, the only button used in the game is the left mouse button. At the beginning and the end, you will be asked for some information and feedback. To do that, you will also need your keyboard. Providing this information is entirely optional but will help my project a lot!

I would love to hear your feedback so feel free to leave a comment below or in the menu at the end of the game. And if you want to know more, you can reach me at zeitgeistinc23@gmail.com. I'm happy to answer all your questions on my project!

And if you feel like competing with other players, just post your final score in the comments below. Let's see who's the ghost hunting master! Also, I would love it if you shared this game with your friens, in case you liked it.

Oh and there's no sound, in case you were wondering. But now go on and hunt some ghosts before it's too late! Thank you for playing. :)

Asset credit primarily goes to Synty Studios and Meshtint Studio
